name: BLOODSUCKED
description:
ONLY TESTED ON ORIGINAL QUEST - STANDALONE AND WITH LINK

This game puts you on the opposite side. You are the bad guy. You are the villain. You are a vampire.

But the good guys surround you as your vampirical lifeforce quickly drains away. The only way out is through them. It's one-on-tons. It's kill or be killed. It's hell-let-loose fun.

It's your last stand.

FEATURES

Fun melee combat.

Sick graphics.

A downloadable song created by the developer.

And fully toggleable Social Output (third-person, player stats) on non-VR displays

CREDITS

Literally everything is by me except for

The base XR Toolkit project provided by the jam hosts

and additional sound effects by zapsplat.org
